```{r, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(ggmap)
library(ggplot2)
library(sf)
library(tmap)
library(tmaptools)
```

#### Here is a map of squirrel location based on primary fur color. 

```{r}
squirrel_census = 
  read_csv("data/clean_squirrel_2018.csv")
```

```{r}
central_park_map = st_read(here::here('central_park', 'CentralPark.shp'))
```

```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = central_park_map, color = "grey") +
  geom_point(
    data = squirrel_census,
    aes(x = x, y = y, color = primary_fur_color),
    size = 0.3, alpha = 0.75) +
  theme_void(base_size = 15) +
  theme(legend.position = 'bottom') +
  guides(color = guide_legend(
    title.position = "top",
    override.aes = list(size = 3))) +
  labs(color = 'Primary Fur Color',
       title = 'Squirrels') +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("Black" = "black", "Gray" = "azure4", "Cinnamon" = "darkorange3")) 
```

```{r}
squirrel_census |> 
  group_by(primary_fur_color) |> 
  summarize(n())
```


```{r fur_plot}
squirrel_fur_graph =
  squirrel_census |> 
  select(unique_squirrel_id, x, y, primary_fur_color) |>
  filter(!is.na(primary_fur_color))

squirrel_fur_graph |> 
  plot_ly(x = ~x, y = ~y, type = "scatter", mode = "markers", color = ~primary_fur_color)
```
